effect.name: Slide
effect.description: Offsets images based on a parameter.
effect.author: Jacob Pariseau

parameter.name: Slide X Coefficient
parameter.description: This variable controls the offset in the horizontal X axis. Positive is right, negative is left.

parameter.name: Slide Y Coefficient
parameter.description: This variable controls the offset in the vertical Y axis. Positive is down, negative is up.
